_header: A Jesu so fair and free / Sweetest of all thing
_description: A hymn of love to Jesus, vaguely based on the preceding Latin, O amor vehemens, Iesu dulcissime… — one 8-line stanza

NLS18721.First Lines:
A iesu so fair an freSuettest of alle
                    þinge…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Bliþe may þat herte beÞat hat of þe
                    meni[n]gge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 54.
